means: 利顿（姓氏； Edward George Earle, Bulwer-1st Baron, 1803-1873，英国小说家，剧作家，政治家）

sentence.Network_en: The first , second and third prizes went to James, Lytton and Tom respectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 詹姆斯 、 利顿和汤姆分获一、二、三等奖.

auth_sentence.content: The youngest, Edward Bulwer Lytton Dickens, had just turned six.

auth_sentence.content: We were arrogant, supercilious, cynical, sarcastic, and Lytton always looked very queer and had a squeaky voice.
